testcase.classname: In order to remember the things I want to do, as a ToDo MVC user,I want to manage my todo list
testcase.name: Todo input accepts numeric,string,alphanumeric,special charachter
testcase.system-out: Given Open the Chrome and launch the application............................passed When enter "12345" item in the input box....................................passed Then I see "12345" is visible in All Todo list..............................passed

testcase.name: Todo input accepts numeric,string,alphanumeric,special charachter 4

testcase.classname: In order to remember the things I want to do, as a ToDo MVC user,I want to manage my todo list
testcase.name: Add ToDo item
testcase.system-out: Given I see TODO MVC app....................................................passed When enter "MVC Data" item in the input box.................................passed Then I see "MVC Data" is visible in All Todo list...........................passed And I see item left count shows 5 Item......................................passed And see presence of checkbox against the "MVC Data".........................passed And All hyperlink is visible and selected...................................passed And Active hyperlink is visible and not selected............................passed And Completed hyperlink is visible and not selected.........................passed

testcase.classname: In order to remember the things I want to do, as a ToDo MVC user,I want to manage my todo list
testcase.name: Behaviour of X icon over ToDos
testcase.system-out: Given I see TODO MVC app....................................................passed When enter "Sample" item in the input box...................................passed Then I see "Sample" is visible in the list..................................passed And I see item left count shows 6 Item......................................passed When I mouse hover to "Sample"..............................................passed Then I see X icon is visible for "Sample"...................................passed When move mouse pointer away from "Sample"..................................passed Then I see X icon disappears from "Sample"..................................passed When I click on X for "Sample"..............................................passed Then "Sample" cannot be seen on All todo list...............................passed And I see item left count shows 5 Item......................................passed

testcase.classname: In order to remember the things I want to do, as a ToDo MVC user,I want to manage my todo list
testcase.name: Verify Active, Completed and Clear completed features
testcase.system-out: Given I see TODO MVC app....................................................passed When I select "MVC Data" checkbox...........................................passed Then "MVC Data" will be strikethrough.......................................passed And Clear completed link is visible and not selected........................passed And I see item left count shows 4 Item......................................passed When I navigate to Active todo list.........................................passed Then I see "SINGTEL" is visible in Active todo list.........................passed And "MVC Data" cannot be seen on Active todo list...........................passed When I navigate to Completed todo list......................................passed Then I see "MVC Data" is visible in Completed todo list.....................passed And "SINGTEL" cannot be seen on Completed todo list.........................passed When I click on Clear completed link........................................passed And I navigate to Completed todo list.......................................passed Then "MVC Data" cannot be seen on Completed todo list.......................passed

testcase.classname: In order to remember the things I want to do, as a ToDo MVC user,I want to manage my todo list
testcase.name: Edit existing Todo item
testcase.system-out: Given I see TODO MVC app....................................................passed When enter "MVC Data" item in the input box.................................passed Then I navigate to All todo list............................................passed And I see "MVC Data" is visible in the list.................................passed When I double click on "MVC Data"...........................................passed And Modify to "Edited MVC Data".............................................passed Then I see "Edited MVC Data" is visible in All todo list....................passed When I navigate to Active todo list.........................................passed Then I see "Edited MVC Data" is visible in Active todo list.................passed
